page.title: 15SHOPPING HABITS
page.content:
The second year children of OUSTON JUNIOR SCHOOL carried out a survey of shopping habits.
They found out that most people,over 90%,do their major shopping outside of the village. They have to travel to the large supermarkets in Birtley and Washington as there are no large stores in the village. Most people did their shopping at Presto in Birtley and Sava Centre in Washington.
To keep down travelling expenses over 80% of the people questioned did their shopping once a fortnight and nearly 10% only once a month.
97% of those surveyed did their main shopping in supermarkets and only 3% in smaller shops.
